title: WTB T200 Philadelphia Americans Fatima Premium
author: Danny Smith

posts.post_title: WTB T200 Philadelphia Americans Fatima Premium
posts.post_content:
Shot in the dark but i'm looking for a t200 Philly Americans Fatima Premium. Prefer lower grade. Trimmed, altered, etc. it's all good. Let me know. Shoot me an email at [url]smithvintagecards@gmail.com[/url] with scans and price.

Danny

Hi Danny,

Tony has the largest inventory of pre-war cards in the nation.  Contact him - he can get it for you if he does not already have it, and as you know, he offers great deals.

Thanks,
Scott

I've got one consigned right now in Sterling's auction...

[url]http://www.sterlingsportsauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?lotid=7872[/url]

Jason-
 That is the regular card, he's looking for the much larger Fatima premium.
I have a strong hunch one will be showing up in an major auction very soon, build up that war chest.
oh, right.  Hence the word "Premium".  Next time I'll read...  ;)

I think he means one like this :)

[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/pt200fatimapremium.jpg[/IMG]
That's the winner!! Leon is that yours?

Danny - I didn't pick up on the word 'premium'.

I exchanged emails with Tony a few days ago and he did tell me that he has the largest pre-war inventory in the country, AND that he is definitely open to offers.  I also visited his website and the selection is, of course, amazing.

I would contact him and see about locating one:  

[url]www.tonyetrade.com[/url]

[quote name="Runscott" post=956553]Danny - I didn't pick up on the word 'premium'.

I exchanged emails with Tony a few days ago and he did tell me that he has the largest pre-war inventory in the country, AND that he is definitely open to offers.  I also visited his website and the selection is, of course, amazing.

I would contact him and see about locating one:  

[url]www.tonyetrade.com[/url][/QUOTE]

Tony does have a large inventory and will work with folks on pricing. That being said these Premiums are really, really scarce. I doubt Tony has any. The one I showed is in my collection, wouldn't be cheap (none of them are) but I am not necessarily married to it either. I do have some cards that I wouldn't consider selling but this isn't one of them..Even this one shown, in the condition it is in, would be north of $2500..best regards

[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/pt200premiumlargest3rd.JPG[/IMG]
Regardless of condition, you could frame that up beautifully.
